channel.title: [New] Eros Online Project [New]
channel.description:
Do any of your remember the Dodian server? Where Yanille was the home, you fought rats in the beginning, moved to the farmer, moved to I think priest, then guards. Then when you got to a high enough level, you were able to fight 'Dad'. And after killing him, a server message would pop up saying who killed 'Dad'. I am looking into re-making that, and I would like to get some sort of a team to help me with this. Cause what I want to do is make is clean. I want to make a stable working server like that. And I need to put together a team of someone with good coding, and the skill to be able to make an area not acessable by non-donaters.
Now that being said.. I want Yanille to obviouslly be the home. Ahaha. Now, the little wizards tower, I want to be donaters only area, Where the monsters I put in there actually drop better than others. And make another monster, just like 'Dad' but a much higher health than 'Dad' and have it to the same thing when it's killed.
I would like to intergrade so much stuff into this, I would like to make it acessable by a webclient. [Since I seem to not be able to do that. Anymore... :/] I would like to just have a bunch of stuff.. Working pick pocketing on the farmer, working cages that you can pick the lock with a 50, 50 chance of getting either one a small amount of money, or a item, not so rare... Or a 50% money, 45% item, and a 5% rare item.. And have it so you can't spam click it, make it so it's like every 5-10 seconds.. This way it's not that bad... I would like all the skills to be working.. I haven't choosen a base yet, I know more coding in PI... But alot of people don't like PI, so I would like to get an opinion on this, for the base used.. As long as it can be used as a webclient... The website no worries about, I already have a website, I just have to re-set it up..
I need a website team, where you work on the website.... Make it look good. Update it frequently..
I need 1 developer, since I see as if there are more, there will be an all out war on what happens with what.. So 1 developer, including me.
I need at least 3 testers.. If anything, and I need more, then more will be on.
We will also have to work hard to make decent prices, and decent drops from all the bad people/monsters.
If you are down for helping, leave a comment, or send me a message.. I do use Skype, so feel free to hit me up on some skype. (:
Demon6994
I don't use MSN, or Yahoo anymore.. Just skype... So hit me up, where ever is good enough for you..
Server Developer: Client Developer: Website Developer: Beta Tester: Beta Tester: Beta Tester:

item.title: [New] Eros Online Project [New]
item.dc:creator: @ajax_i ajax i
item.description:
@ajax_i wrote:

I’d be completely down to be a beta tester.
I know basic not-so-extensive knowledge of HTML also, for the website, but to be honest probably not enough.

Read full topic

item.title: [New] Eros Online Project [New]
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

arham 4:

Haha. Funny thing is, I used to be working on a side and its name was Eris. xD

Nice. This was one of the first RSPS’s I ever played, before I got into developing… And now, I feel I don’t see it anymore, and I would like to bring it back… I mean, it seems right to me… I’m not one to like to do things, but I just don’t see this part anymore, and i’d like to make it work. (:

Read full topic
